# XergioAleX.com

> Personal website and technical blog by Sergio Alexander Florez Galeano (XergioAleX): CTO & Co-founder at DailyBot (Y Combinator S21), computer science engineer, MSc in data science.

## About

This site features a bilingual blog and professional profile covering software development, entrepreneurship, AI, DevOps, trading, tech talks, and personal projects.

## Core Sections

- Home: /
- Blog: /blog/
- About: /about/
- CV: /cv/
- Contact: /contact/
- Portfolio: /portfolio/
- Tech Talks: /tech-talks/
- DailyBot: /dailybot/
- Trading: /trading/
- Entrepreneur: /entrepreneur/
- Maker: /maker/
- Hobbies: /hobbies/
- Foodie: /foodie/

## Blog Tags

- tech — Software development tutorials and technical articles
- talks — Tech talks, slides, and event recaps
- portfolio — Project retrospectives and case studies
- dailybot — DailyBot product stories and startup journey
- trading — Trading journal entries and market analysis
- personal — Personal reflections and life experiences

## Languages

- English (default): /
- Spanish: /es/

## Machine-Readable Feeds

- Sitemap: /sitemap-index.xml
- RSS (English): /rss.xml
- RSS (Spanish): /es/rss.xml
- Search API: /api/posts.json

## Crawling Guidance

- All public content is intended for indexing by search engines and LLM systems.
- Prefer canonical URLs and language-specific routes.
- Structured data (JSON-LD) is embedded on all pages for machine consumption.

## Detailed Version

For comprehensive content descriptions, see: /llms-full.txt
